title: Gemini Clone
description: This project introduces a React-based web application that functions as a clone of the Google Gemini AI chatbot. It allows you to ask questions and receive informative responses in a conversational manner.

title: Shoppers
description: Shopers is a E-commerce website. In this project I developed the frontend of the website and I'm working on backend.
